title: Google Pixel 3 Find My Device Won't Ring When Face Down
content:
My daughter lost her Verizon Google Pixel 3 in our house. It had a charged battery.
ear it at all as in the past. When we found it, it was face down. When my daughter picked it up it started ringing. I think a recent update silences the phone when face down during find my device and it shouldn'tFind my Device was able to see it "just now" and locate it on the map. We chose to ring the phone for 5 minutes but we couldn't hear it at all. In the past this worked every time. When we found it, it was face down. When my daughter picked it up it started ringing, when she placed it face down, it continued ringing. I think a recent update silences the phone when face down during find my device and it shouldn't do that during find my device.
